data.sentence: The word الْمَاءَ comes from the root م و ه and is associated with the meanings: water, rain

data.meanings: to pour out, be poured out. sabbun - the act of pouring. sabban - the act of pouring heavily.
data.sentence: The word صَبَبْنَا comes from the root ص ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to pour out, be poured out. sabbun - the act of pouring. sabban - the act of pouring heavily.

data.sentence: The word صَبًّا comes from the root ص ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to pour out, be poured out. sabbun - the act of pouring. sabban - the act of pouring heavily.
